title: 整合包崩溃 附崩溃报告
author: z542507285
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I let you down. Sorry :(

Time: 15-7-30 下午3:39
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop

replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2015-7-30 16:04
[1.7.10]启示录——Apocalypse.jar出错，删除
感谢。。。已经好了
